job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: ltulgtltligtProficient in three or more of the following programming languages R Python SAS or SQLltligt ltligtAbility to perform advanced statistical analysis and modeling such as liner and nonliner regression resampling and Markov chainsltligt ltligtExtensive knowledge of predictive modeling machine learning algorithms such as clustering decision trees dimensionality reduction and natural language processingltligt ltligtProficient in feature engineering techniques and exploratory data analysisltligt ltligtWorking knowledge of optimization techniques and artificial intelligence methodsltligt ltligtAbility to analyze large quantities of information and identify patterns irregularities and deficienciesltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtThe Data Scientist is responsible for designing and validating predictive models machine learning models and artificial intelligence that inform and improve business processes across the organization operational clinical financial marketing etcltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtEssential Functionsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtMine and analyze large structured and unstructured datasetsltligt ltligtDevelop visualizations that demonstrate the efficacy of models ltligt ltligtProvide statistical validation of outcomes analysis associated with clinical programs and interventionsltligt ltligtCommunicate results and ideas to key stakeholdersltligt ltligtPerform any other job duties as requestedltligtltulgtltligtltulgt
